page.title: 19A DAY IN SHAWBURY WITH CARL
page.content: One morning I overslept and I was late for{school.}I had my{breakfast quickly and cleaned my teeth.I rushed to get my shoes and coat on and rushed to school.I got to school and did some {work. } When it was{playtime}I had a{game of football and a game of tig.When I got into school I did some Look and Read work. When it was {dinner-time}I went home for dinner.When I got back I played football.Then I went in to school and did some painting.At last period the class had a game of rounders. When I got home I had some jelly and icecream for{tea.}I went out to play on my bike. I came in at eight o'clock.Then I had a bath,and went down and watched{television.}Then I went to bed at about nine o'clock.
